Miscellaneous activities you can do.

## /activities plank_make

**Usage**

- `/activities plank_make action:<string> type:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | `string` | Yes | The method you wish to make planks. | Demon Butler, Sawmill |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | The type of planks to make. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of planks to make. | - |

## /activities chompy_hunt

**Usage**

- `/activities chompy_hunt action:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | `string` | Yes | Start a Chompy hunting trip, or claim hats. | - |

**Parameters**

| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

## /activities collect

**Usage**

- `/activities collect item:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [no_stams:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item to collect. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of collecting trips. | - |
| `no_stams` | `boolean` | No | Don't use stamina potions when collecting. | - |

## /activities decant

**Usage**

- `/activities decant potion_name:<string> [dose:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `potion_name` | `string` | Yes | The name of the potion. | - |
| `dose` | `integer` | No | The dosage to decant them to. (default 4) | - |

**Usage**

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `item` | `string` | Yes | The item you want to charge | Amulet of glory, Ring of wealth |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The amount of inventories you want to charge.  (optional) | - |
